title: Flight Simulator 2020  - Addon spotlight - Mataveri International Airport - version 1.0
description:
In this addon spotlight we are going to look at  Mataveri International Airport (SCIP) version 1.0  which has been released. This addon has been created by a community member and is the only airport on Easter Island which is famous for it's Ahu Tongariki ( Moai sculptures ).

We first have a look at the airport after which we take off and try to find the sculptures. If we are successful in finding them? Check this video and you will find out.

If you want to give the airport a try yourself you can download it from the site below: 
https://flightsim.to/file/19230/scip-mataveri-international-easter-island-chile

The Ahu Tongariki can also be added to MSFS 2020 if you want to do that download the via the linke below:
https://flightsim.to/file/3830/ahu-tongariki-moai-sculptures-easter-island-chile
